issue.title: adguard.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://adguard.com/en/test.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fadguard.com%2Fen%2Ftest.html) ### Comment > It was fine a couple days ago until I just noticed that YouTube (in Safari) displays ads before the videos. > > Tried turning off and on Advanced protection wouldn’t work. > > Tried toggling off and on AdGuard Pro Safari extensions in iPad’s setting also wouldn’t work. > > Force reset iPad wouldn’t work either. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Forgot to mention that my issue is that the AdGuard “Advanced protection” doesn’t work on 2 of my iPads (used to work) while my iPhone is working properly, despite the face that all of them have the same settings in both AdGuard app and iOS setting.
